name: scope-lens
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 1.
short_effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a lens that boosts the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a lens that boosts the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
